Jeremiah or Jeremias__33.6__The prayer of peace: : That is, the peace and welfare which they pray for.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__33.17__There shall not be cut off from Davi: : This was verified in Christ, who is of the house of David; and whose kingdom in his church shall have no end.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__33.18__Neither shall there be cut off from: : This promise relates to the Christian priesthood; which shall also continue for ever: the functions of which (more especially the great sacrifice of the altar) are here expressed by the name of holocausts, and other offerings of the law, which were so many figures of the Christian sacrifice.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__33.24__Two families: : Viz., the families of the kings and priests.
